**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 220 The world is a dangerous place. Thankfully, there are those who devote their lives to easing the pain and suffering of others. Members [Apothecary](/NPCs.aspx?ID=908) (Creature -1), [Physician](/NPCs.aspx?ID=909) (Creature -1), [Plague Doctor](/NPCs.aspx?ID=911) (Creature 5), [Surgeon](/NPCs.aspx?ID=910) (Creature 2)
Ailments Common diseases are located [here](/diseases). These can be treated by most healers, though they may have longer-term physiological impacts. For unusual conditions, like [ghoul fever](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218) or [mummy rot](/Monsters.aspx?ID=304), you might impose penalties on a normal healer attempting to remedy them.
Medical Service Prices The [physician](/NPCs.aspx?ID=909) and [surgeon](/NPCs.aspx?ID=910) are masters of [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9); the [apothecary](/NPCs.aspx?ID=908) and [plague doctor](/NPCs.aspx?ID=911) are experts. Plague doctors charge five times this rate, and surgeons 10 times. **Identify Affliction**: 1 sp.
[**Treat Wounds**](/Actions.aspx?ID=57): 2 sp.
[**Treat Disease**](/Actions.aspx?ID=55): 1 gp.
**[First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54) or [Treating a Poison](/Actions.aspx?ID=56)**: 1 sp.
